tags: I'm almost eight and three quarters

summary: Batson, Im from an alt universe. Batsy doesn’t exist, and therefore has no kids. I am going to find you a shazam costume for 3...
question: Batson, Im from an alt universe. Batsy doesn’t exist, and therefore has no kids. I am going to find you a shazam costume for 3 y/os. Then you cant complain.
answer: I’m not three! I’m eight and a half! *crosses arms and pouts*

its a creative outlet & free advertising
anyone can right-click and save your images fgs
summary: Soo my first look at Brie Larson as Captain Marvel edit (where I painted her costume red & blue) just got taken down and I now...
body:
Soo my first look at Brie Larson as Captain Marvel edit (where I painted her costume red & blue) just got taken down and I now have a copyright strike :)))

it’s not like I claimed to have taken the photo, I saved the damn thing off of tumblr in the first place :/ if they really wanted to enforce copyright laws we’d all be violating them with our edits & gifs. Just stick your website as the source material (it was DailyMail who gave the claim) and let people enjoy the edit AND visit your site. Win win.

blog.name: caroljessshipevents
blog.title: CAROLJESS SHIP EVENTS
blog.description: Welcome to the Carol/Jess fan event blog where we will be hosting mini bangs and other fandom events!

title: Carol/Jess Secret Santa
body:
Announcing sign ups for the 2018 Carol/Jess Secret Santa. Particpants will get matched with someone to create and receive a 500+ word fic, piece of art, or other fanwork.

Timeline:

Sign ups: Open now. Close 1st of November.

Assignments: Recived by November 8th at latest.

Final posting date: December 17th.

After sign ups close, you will be given the name and likes/do not want list of the person you are creating a gift for. You should remain anonymous until posting, but if you have question or issues you may contact the mods. When creating a gift it must not contain anything from their dnw list and you are adviced to take their likes into account. If possible you will be given a match based on your likes and dnws, so please be sure to fill these out accordingly.

If you need to withdraw at any point please let us know ASAP so we can find someone else to provide a gift for your recipient.

Sign up by filling out our Google form HERE

If you have any questions or concerns you can email us at caroljessshipevents@gmail.com or feel free to come and discuss Carol/Jess and the event on the Carol/Jess Discord server HERE

tags: I mean they already tused it right???
summary: Instead of a literal translation (which is also used and was used in the tpb with that name) the promo for Captain Marvel in...
body:
Instead of a literal translation (which is also used and was used in the tpb with that name) the promo for Captain Marvel in Spain uses what could be translated to: “Superior. Advanced. Fast”

There was literally a paperback with “higher, further, faster” translated.

What is this mess.

Update: the Brazilian poster did it right (Mais alto, mais longe, mais veloz vs. our Superior, avanzada, rápida). I’ve seen someone suggest that it may have been translated like that to put fem adjectives, but even with that it would have missed the fact that the same line was already translated. I mean I would have preferred the Latin, original version (citius, altius, fortius) than this mess. Some people have joked about the fact that it sounds like a vacuum commercial or something like that (like David Baldeón https://twitter.com/david_baldeon/status/1051876041399128065?s=19). The movies/TV shows/comics translation is usually good, but I don’t know why they always mess up the promotional content.

I mean I would have preferred the Latin, original version (citius, altius, fortius) than this mess. Some people have joked about the fact that it sounds like a vacuum commercial or something like that (like David Baldeón https://twitter.com/david_baldeon/status/1051876041399128065?s=19). She’s a fucking douche


Make a movie about MISS Marvel
Kamala Khan is a much better protagonist
